title: postman.v2.Header
description: Header A representation for a list of headers

disable.title: mojo.core.Bool
disable.description: If set to true, the current header will not be sent with requests

key.title: mojo.core.String
key.description: This holds the LHS of the HTTP Header, e.g Content-Type or X-Custom-Header.

value.title: mojo.core.String
value.description: The value (or the RHS) of the Header is stored in this field.
